data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Gorakhpur that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gorakhpur, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Gorakhpur. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Gorakhpur, Uttar Pradesh, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, help the 48,850 believers in Gorakhpur to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jat Dalal (Muslim traditions) people.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Gorakhpur, Uttar Pradesh, India, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Gorakhpur.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Gorakhpur, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 4,440,900.

We estimate Gorakhpur has 48,850 people who might know Jesus, 53,883 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,338,167 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Gorakhpur to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
